body:
I am trying to create a packages mirror on release 012 and I receive conflict error. This shouldn't happen for mirroring?

```
l12:/tmp$ spack mirror -n create -d /tmp/spack -D
==> Error: Conflicts in concretized spec "aegean@0.15.2%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64/3mk576l"

List of matching conflicts for spec:

            ^fontconfig@2.12.3%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^font-util@1.3.1%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

                ^freetype@2.9.1%gcc@7.1.0 patches=08466355e8649235ff01f13b3e56bbd551c7cfb2ca97903cc11575c163ea32a3 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^bzip2@1.0.6%gcc@7.1.0+shared arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

                ^gperf@3.0.4%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^libxml2@2.9.8%gcc@7.1.0~python arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^libiconv@1.15%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                    ^xz@5.2.4%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
            ^glib@2.56.3%gcc@7.1.0~libmount patches=c325997b72a205ad1638bb3e3ba0e5b73e3d32ce63b2d0d3282f3e3a2ff4663c tracing=none arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^gettext@0.19.8.1%gcc@7.1.0+bzip2+curses+git~libunistring+libxml2 patches=9acdb4e73f67c241b5ef32505c9ddf7cf6884ca8ea661692f21dca28483b04b8 +tar+xz arch=linux-centos7-x86_64

                    ^gdbm@1.18.1%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                        ^readline@7.0%gcc@7.1.0 arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
                ^python@2.7.16%gcc@7.1.0+bz2+ctypes+dbm+lzma~nis~optimizations+pic+pyexpat+pythoncmd+readline+shared+sqlite3+ssl~tkinter~ucs4~uuid+zlib arch=linux-centos7-x86_64
```

title: spack mirror - conflict
